answers.answer: I've gotten this too a couple of times I noticed when I was showering.. I forgot to ask my Dr but it was almost like I was seeing fireflies everywhere for a few seconds? Id like to know if its normal too
I've had that. And asked my Dr about it. He said since my blood pressure was OK that it was due to getting up too fast. Please bring it up to your Dr tho. Better safe than sorry.
will ask. just idk if im weak or something or i need more vitamins :S
it could be dehydration. blood pressure or blood sugar, i got it a few times during my pregnancy
Hey I got this one time too it was really hot and I was upset with my sister and I seen them. I'll have to mention it next time I see my doc.
i am keeping myself hydrated much but i hope its not blood pressure cause that i think might be it or idk. :(i have my appt till monday lets see what my doctor says :S :(
That happens to me when I sneeze or get up too fast and when I cone out of a really hot shower
This been happening to me too lately , im kinda dehydrated since my last appt on monday !!
I was told that seeing flashing lights and almost like things in your sight could he a sign of pre eclampsia
omg thts what ive read too but im not swollen or anything like that :oso i wouldnt think I would have that actually and its only happened twice in three days so idk :S
I had that as well and turned out to be preeclampsia. Hoping yours Is juss from gettin' up to fast!
what else are signs of preeclampsia? :O
Pre eclampsia, or toxemia symptoms include high blood pressure, protein or sugar in urine, and really bad swelling

question: This has happened twice in the past three days where I see sparkling lights on both my eyes *o* everywhere! I am taking my prenatal, is it just cause I got up too fast? *o* anyone experienced this, is it bad?
title: sparkle lights
